title: Lottery Datasets from Caixa Economica Federal
text: goal package provide function automatically import data lotteries Caixa Econômica Federal R environment. Data lotteries Caixa Econômica Federal includes information various games Mega-Sena, Lotofácil, Quina, among others. downloaded official website Federal Savings Bank https://loterias.caixa.gov.br/.

title: Function to download lottery data from git repository — get_data
Function to download lottery data from git repository — get_data
code: # \donttest{ library(lotterybr) megasena_ganhadores <- get_data(game= "megasena",type = "winners") megasena_ganhadores #> # A tibble: 8,604 × 6 #>    date       course accumulated match winners    prize #>    <date>      <int> <chr>       <chr>   <int>    <dbl> #>  1 1996-03-11      1 yes         6           0       0  #>  2 1996-03-11      1 yes         5          17   39159. #>  3 1996-03-11      1 yes         4        2016     330. #>  4 1996-03-18      2 no          6           1 2307162. #>  5 1996-03-18      2 no          5          65   14424. #>  6 1996-03-18      2 no          4        4488     209. #>  7 1996-03-25      3 no          6           2  391193. #>  8 1996-03-25      3 no          5          62   10516. #>  9 1996-03-25      3 no          4        4261     153. #> 10 1996-04-01      4 yes         6           0       0  #> # ℹ 8,594 more rows  lotofacil_dezenas <- get_data(game= "lotofacil",type = "numbers") lotofacil_dezenas #> # A tibble: 12,195 × 4 #>    date       course accumulated numbers #>    <date>      <int> <chr>       <chr>   #>  1 2003-09-29      1 no          02      #>  2 2003-09-29      1 no          03      #>  3 2003-09-29      1 no          05      #>  4 2003-09-29      1 no          06      #>  5 2003-09-29      1 no          09      #>  6 2003-09-29      1 no          10      #>  7 2003-09-29      1 no          11      #>  8 2003-09-29      1 no          13      #>  9 2003-09-29      1 no          14      #> 10 2003-09-29      1 no          16      #> # ℹ 12,185 more rows # }
